conbody.p: You can change user interface language and customize names and icons for the external inputs and outputs of the audio hub.

Select EditSettings _fixme_ [ui] from the main menu. A Settings window will appear on your screen ( ), where you can change user interface language, customize audio hub connections, set time out interval for autoscan and enable/disable the advanced mode.
conbody.note: The settings are stored in a plain text XML file located in %APPDATA%\LAIN\idllab\settings.xml. The file can be opened and edited in any text editor supporting Unicode (for example, Notepad++). We strongly advise this to be performed only by very experienced users familiar with the XML syntax.
